words.ex: She pursued the project with remarkable zeal.
The team remained zealous in their pursuit of excellence.
Her influence reached its zenith during the final negotiations.
A gentle zephyr drifted through the open window.
The zeroth principle underpins all subsequent rules.
He tackled the challenge with unexpected zest.
Her zestful approach inspired the entire group.
The ancient ziggurat dominated the desert landscape.
He ended the debate with a sharp zinger.
The study analyzed zonal variations in climate patterns.
